data.name: Confessions at Candlewood Lake Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Return to those romantic times at Candlewood Lake with this soothing and relaxing soundtrack. Enjoy this mix of gentle guitar tracks and classy jazz songs and be whisked away to those passionate days.
